elements.Text: Are you worried that suggesting to your boss that they get the flu shot will cause problems?

elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.

elements.text: Why are you filling in words with letters? By repeatedly filling in missing letters to complete positive, neutral, or negative words, the brain engages in flexible thinking patterns to reduce rigid thinking.
